channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat, Inc. -- libpam4j
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat, Inc. -- libpam4j

item.title: CVE-2017-12197|2024-08-05T18:28:16.597Z -- red%20hat%2C%20inc. -- libpam4j
item.description: It was found that libpam4j up to and including 1.8 did not properly validate user accounts when authenticating. A user with a valid password for a disabled account would be able to bypass security restrictions and possibly access sensitive information.
